channel.title: IP Ban help

item.title: IP Ban help
item.dc:creator: @Linksbro Linksbro
item.description:
@Linksbro wrote:

if(checkbannedips() == 5) { returnCode = 4; System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned."); appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned."); savefile = false; disconnected = true;

This is basicly what I have, and I have a bannedips.txt also. When I insert the IP into the .txt file, it says on my server runner, “player failed to logon because their ip is banned” and yet, they still log on.

Also, I saw this code around forums and wondering how I can get it to work,

if (!connectingHost.equals("The guys host address here")) {

I put it in the server.java, but I don’t know what to put under it for a disconnect\ban.

My IP ban command is working, and it puts the players IP in bannedips.txt, but the error above keeps happening.

Help would be thanked.

-Linksbro

Read full topic
